fieldUpdates.formula:
TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(NOW())))+"/" +TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(NOW())))+"/" +TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))) & " " & IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW() - 0.208 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW() - 0.208 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW() - 0.208 ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW() - 0.208 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( NOW() - 0.208 ), 15, 2 ) &" "& IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW() - 0.208 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) & " - " &"("& $User.FirstName & " " & $User.LastName &")"& " - " + Update__c + BR()& BR()
+PRIORVALUE( Notes__c )

This sends a text message following up to someone who never returned a call. It goes out one day after being marked accordingly.

When the last call was more recently than the next call date. Clear the next call date field

criteriaItems.value: 01 Intro,01 Intro 2,01 Intro 3,02 Wait,03 No Interest,04 No Response,07 TOC Open,12 Appt Sold,Appt A,Appt B,Appt C

rules.fullName: Move to Info to Intro 2 after 3 days

rules.description: This updates the field Name and Title Change Date
This workflow notifies the Account Owner and Director when a client submits a referral through the portal.

rules.fullName: New Process - Automatically Move Record Out of Suspect
rules.description: When DevPhase is 01 Suspect, Last Activity Datetime is populated and Current User Role contains BDS or Desktop Support Sepcialist or PSM

rules.fullName: New Process - Automatically Move to Cleansing Max Reached
rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 4 AND 5 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) AND (3 OR 6)
rules.description: When DevPhase is 02 Cleansing, Current Stage Dials is >= 8, Account is NOT Abstrakt, Process Hold is false, Decision Maker & Influencer are blank, Industry is NOT Mortgage either Prospekt Process or Pipeline Process is True, Moves to Cleansing Max Reached

rules.fullName: New Process - Automatically Move to Intro 2 v2
rules.description: When DevOutcome is 01 Intro or Info, Current Stage Dials >= 4, # of Dials When Moved to Current Stage > 0, Intro 1 Date is NOT Last 1 Days, Pipeline Process is True and Prospekt or Pipeline Process is True, Moves record to Intro 2 automatically.

rules.fullName: New Process - Automatically Move to Intro 3
rules.description: When DevOutcome is 01 Intro 2, Current Stage Dials >= 4, # of Dials When Moved to Current Stage > 0, Intro 2 Date != Last 1 Days and Pipeline or Prospekt Process is True, Moves record to Intro 3 automatically.

rules.fullName: New Process - Automatically Move to NR v2
rules.description: When DevOutcome is 01 Intro 3, Current Stage Dials = 4, # of Dials When Moved to Current Stage > 0, Intro 3 Date < Last 5 Days and Prospekt or Pipeline Process is True, Moves record to No Response after 4 Intro 3 calls and updates the number of dials

rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 5) AND 2 AND (3 OR 6) AND 4 AND 7
rules.description: When DevPhase is 02 Cleansing, Last Activity Datetime is Today, Prospekt or Pipeline Process is true and Follow Up Call Date is blank or before Today, Sets up call date for Cleansing Calls
Sets up call date for Intro 1 Calls

When DevOutcome is 01 Intro or Info, Intro 1 Date is Today, Prospekt or Pipeline Process is True and Follow Up Call Date is blank or before Today, Sets up call date for Intro 1 Call 1 and for Lead Info

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 6) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 7))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 1 Call 2 and Info Call 2

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 6) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 7))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 2 Call 1

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 7) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 2 Call 2

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 7) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 3 Call 1

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 7) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 3 Call 2

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 7) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 3 Call 3

rules.booleanFilter: ((1 OR 7) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6))
rules.description: Sets up call date for Intro 3 Call 4

Sets up call date for Lead Development - Call 3 (Warm Lead and Wait)

criteriaItems.value: Appt B,Appt A,Appt C,07 TOC Open

rules.description: When DevOutcome is Appt B, Appt A or Appt C, Account is Abstrakt Marketing Group
When DevOutcome is Appt A or Appt Rescheduled, Account is NOT Abstrakt Marketing Group and Appt Scheduled Date is more than 2 days from now. This is for integration clients.
When DevOutcome is Appt A or Appt Rescheduled, Account is NOT Abstrakt Marketing Group and Appt Scheduled Date is more than 2 days from now. This is for non-integration clients.
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(DevOutcome__c, "Appt A"), ISPICKVAL(DevOutcome__c, "Appt Rescheduled")), Account.Name <> "Abstrakt Marketing Group", Account.Name <> "Nevco", RecordTypeId <> "012G0000001Qbs7", Appt_Scheduled_Date__c > TODAY () + 3)

rules.description: When DevOutcome is Appt A or Appt Rescheduled, Account is NOT Abstrakt Marketing Group and Appt Scheduled Date is less than 4 days from now
rules.formula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(DevOutcome__c, "Appt A"), ISPICKVAL(DevOutcome__c, "Appt Rescheduled"), ISPICKVAL(DevOutcome__c, "07 TOC Open")), RecordTypeId <> "012G0000001Qbs7", Account.Name <> "Abstrakt Marketing Group", Workato_Integration__c <> True, Appt_Scheduled_Date__c <= TODAY () + 3)

rules.description: When DevOutcome contains Appt Reschedule and Account is NOT Abstrakt Marketing Group
When Last Activity Datetime is >= to Follow Up Call Date

rules.fullName: SYS - Field Updates when Moved to Suspect

criteriaItems.value: Cameron Borri,Samantha Wisdom,Nicholas Wulf,Paul Heidbrier,Danielle Boyd,Sean Boudreau,Megan Berkman,Kyle Delane,JD Armstrong,Shane Kracht,Doug Jennings

rules.description: This will automatically clear out appropriate fields when a record needs to be moved back to Suspect

When Appt Date is changed 4-16-19 Nick W - Changed the first field to Appt_Scheduled_Date__c vs Appt Date to try to fix quality response time issue with reschedules 5-23-19 Paul H - included Quality Reviewed = false to fix negative response time
rules.formula: OR(AND(ISCHANGED( Appt_Scheduled_Date__c ),Quality_Reviewed__c = FALSE),AND( ISNEW() , NOT( ISBLANK(Appt_Date__c ))),AND(ISCHANGED( Appt_Scheduled_Date__c ),NOT( ISBLANK(Appt_Set_Time__c))))

rules.description: When DevOutcome changes to equal 07 TOC Open, 08 TOC Sold, 09 TOC Recycle, 10 TOC Disqualified, 11 Appt Open, or 11 Appt Open, Signed Up, Appt A, Appt B, or Appt C; the Appt Date field is set to the current date.
